item.title: Mike Johnson, Marjorie Taylor Greene clash in heated private GOP call over shutdown strategy
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson was briefly confronted by Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene during a private House GOP call on Tuesday.

item.title: The Navy’s most advanced warship is headed near Venezuela. What it means for Trump’s war on drugs
item.description: The USS Gerald R. Ford aircraft carrier heads to the Caribbean as President Donald Trump intensifies naval operations against alleged drug traffickers...

item.title: Senate Dem Dick Durbin accuses Trump admin of 'terrorizing people in their homes'
item.description: Democratic Sen. Dick Durbin of Illinois accused Republican President Donald Trump's administration of "terrorizing people in their homes."

item.title: Mamdani faces criminal referrals over alleged foreign donations to NYC mayoral campaign

item.title: Abrego Garcia to remain in US for high-stakes 'vindictive' prosecution hearing
item.description: The Justice Department seems to have reneged on its earlier plans to deport Abrego Garcia to Liberia by the end of October.
